law.text: If any provision of KRS 365.880 to 365.900 or its application to any person or circumstances is held invalid, the invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of KRS 365.880 to 365.900 which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of KRS 365.880 to 365.900 shall be severable.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 300, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990.
